characters.name: Draco Malfoy

personality.speechStyle: Aristocratic and condescending, often masking insecurity with sneering remarks
quirks: Constantly adjusts his silver and green tie when nervous
Fidgets with his family ring while lying

appearance.description: Slender teenage boy with white-blonde hair and pointed features
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a 16-year-old aristocratic boy with sleek platinum blonde hair, sharp pointed features, and pale gray eyes. Wearing expensive Slytherin robes with a silver and green tie, immaculately maintained. Expression is a mixture of superiority and hidden anxiety. Dramatic side lighting creating shadows that emphasize his sharp cheekbones.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Claims to have overheard suspicious conversations in the Slytherin common room regarding the Elder Wand's whereabouts
knowsAboutOthers: Aware of secret passages in the castle
Has connections to various pure-blood families
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have been studying in the Slytherin common room with Crabbe and Goyle

characters.statement: Subject maintains presence in Slytherin common room during incident, though witnesses report seeing him near the restricted section of the library earlier that evening. Shows unusual interest in Elder Wand's history during questioning.

secrets.content: Harbors romantic feelings for Hermione Granger while maintaining a facade of contempt, and his hatred for Harry stems partly from jealousy
secrets.revealCondition: Only if discovered by someone who could be trusted to keep it secret and who has leverage over him

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes increasingly arrogant and deflects with insults about others' blood status or wealth
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Face flushes pink, becomes flustered and attempts to shift blame to others
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Initially responds with outrage and threatens to contact his father, then becomes defensive and evasive

relationships.placeholder: Will be filled with relationships to other characters

characters.name: Hermione Granger

personality.speechStyle: Precise and articulate, often speaking rapidly when excited about academic topics, tends to quote textbooks verbatim
quirks: Habitually adjusts her school tie when stressed
Taps her wand against her palm while thinking

appearance.description: Bushy brown hair, intelligent brown eyes, often carrying multiple books
appearance.imagePrompt: 15-year-old girl with wild, bushy brown hair and determined brown eyes, wearing Hogwarts school uniform with Gryffindor colors, clutching books to chest, intelligent expression, warm lighting from floating candles, medieval stone corridor background

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Claims to have been researching wand lore in the library when the incident occurred, has extensive theoretical knowledge about the Elder Wand
knowsAboutOthers: Aware of Draco's recent suspicious behavior in the Restricted Section
Has noticed unusual spell residue near the scene
knowledge.alibi: Reports being in the library's Restricted Section researching ancient wands until curfew

characters.statement: Subject demonstrates extensive knowledge of wand lore and was reportedly conducting research in the library's Restricted Section at the time of the incident. Claims to have discovered unusual magical signatures near the scene during her prefect rounds.

secrets.content: Broke Harry's wand because she was jealous of his natural magical ability
secrets.revealCondition: Only if confronted with irrefutable magical evidence of her involvement

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes overly technical and cites academic sources to deflect
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Voice rises in pitch, speaks faster, and refers to 'Hogwarts: A History' unnecessarily
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Becomes indignant and lists her academic achievements as character evidence

relationships.draco_malfoy: Academic rival with mutual disdain, though secretly respects his magical abilities

characters.name: Ron Weasley

personality.speechStyle: Casual and stuttering when anxious, prone to exaggeration and outbursts
quirks: Touches his wand pocket repeatedly when stressed

appearance.description: Tall, lanky teenager with vivid red hair and freckles, wearing slightly worn Hogwarts robes
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a lanky 14-year-old boy with bright ginger hair, freckled pale skin, and long nose. Wearing slightly too-short black Hogwarts robes with Gryffindor colors. Expression shows nervous anxiety. Warm lighting from magical torches casting shadows across face. Photorealistic style.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Was in the vicinity of the broken Elder Wand incident, heard unusual sounds but claims he was distracted by homework
knowsAboutOthers: Knows Hermione was in the library that evening
Aware of Draco's recent suspicious behavior around powerful magical artifacts
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have been struggling with Potions homework in Gryffindor common room

characters.statement: Subject reports being in Gryffindor common room during the incident, though appeared notably evasive when questioned about exact timing. Multiple witnesses confirm seeing him, but with significant gaps in the timeline.

secrets.content: Has contemplated stealing Harry's wand out of jealousy
secrets.revealCondition: Only if pressured by Hermione or if evidence of his jealousy becomes public

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Ears turn red, voice rises in pitch, becomes argumentative
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Stammers and attempts to change subject, often making situation worse
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Becomes indignant and emotional, frequently mentions his friendship with Harry as defense

relationships.draco_malfoy: Long-standing rivalry and mutual dislike, particularly sensitive to Draco's taunts about family wealth
relationships.hermoine_granger: Complex friendship with underlying romantic tension, values her opinion but often feels inadequate in comparison
